$:/plugins/tobibeer/make/filters.js.title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/make/filters.js

$:/plugins/tobibeer/make/readme.title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/make/readme
$:/plugins/tobibeer/make/readme.text:
Provides the filter `[make[]]` to create unique, even random titles or text.

; Placeholders
: `%date%` — a datestamp of the current time (format: `YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ss`)
: `%count%` — current count (see options: ''min'', ''inc'', ''max'')
: `%max%` — max number generated
: `%tiddler%` — defined ''tiddler'' or current
: `%title%` — input title
: when not operating on input titles, the (current) tiddler title

: `<<variable>>`
: `{{text!!reference}}`
: `random()` — a 16 letter random string, or short, e.g.: `random(8)`
: `%uuid%` — a universally unique identifier
; Options
: `min:1` — starting number
: `inc:1` — increment
: `max:2` — max number
: `sep:-` — separator before unique count
: `date-format:<dateFormatString>` — for `%date%`
: `tiddler:foo` — used for ''unique'' and text-references
: `unique:field` — unique field-name instead of global titles
: `unique:index` — unique data tiddler index
: `pad:max` — zero-pad count to length of max
: `pad:5` — zero-pad count to 5 digits: 00001

; Documentation / examples / demos...
: http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins#make

$:/plugins/tobibeer/make/utils.js.title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/make/utils.js
